name: Poly Macro Oscillator 2
description: [This algorithm is a polysynth where each voice is essentially a Plaits (the open source Plaits](https://github.com/pichenettes/eurorack/tree/master/plaits) [92] module by Émilie Gillet). Please refer to the section 'Common polysynth features' above.
gui_description: The display shows the notes being played by the various voices. Note that Plaits voices never really end – in theory they decay forever.

specifications.name: Voices
specifications.description: Number of simultaneous voices, ranging from 1 to 8.

output_ports.name: Main output
output_ports.description: The bus for the 'Main' output signal. Can be mixed with Aux if selected on the same bus.

output_ports.name: Aux output
output_ports.description: The bus for the 'Aux' output signal.
